name: Stainless Steel Slant Tweezer
categories: Tools & Brushes, Beauty Tools, Tweezers & Eyebrow Tools
about: What it is:A classic slant tip tweezer to expertly and precisely shape your brows...What Else You Need to Know:The professional-quality, 25-degree slanted tip is the perfect angle for working against the brow bone. Perfectly aligned hand-filed tips close evenly and firmly to remove hair from the root. This product is not tested on animals.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by opening pores using a warm washcloth. (Not too hot or it can cause redness.) This will help get your hair ready for removal and help reduce pain..-Hold the Slant Tweezer using your thumb and index fingers near the middle of the tweezer body for maximum control..-After locating the unwanted hair, grab the tweezer tips slanted at a 25-degree angle and squeeze down on the body of the tweezer, pulling in the direction of hair growth. This will remove the hair from the root..-Continue until you have removed all unwanted hair..-Clean tweezer tips after each use with alcohol wipe or peroxide. Tweezer cannot be sanitized in an autoclave or barbicide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a high quality product that lives up to the standard I expect from tweezerman. It is sturdy but able to get fine hair. The price point is high but this is a solid buy for my eyebrow needs. This may not be necessary for finger haired people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these tweezers! Iu2019ve had them for approx 2 years now and they work great. I would recommend buying these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased multiple times. Some have been perfect others have been defective and donu2019t tweeze well.
